Container.Name: Pre-Seederr
Container.Overview: A lightweight web application written in Go that automates Reverse Cross-Seeding. Upload a target .torrent file, and the app will automatically search Prowlarr for matching releases by file size and instantly inject both the active download and a paused payload into qBittorrent simultaneously.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: The port the web interface will run on.

Config.Name: Config Data
Config.Description: Where the config.json settings file will be saved.
